subject: Re: Fw: KODILO Product Codes & Colours

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for sending this through.

We’ve completed the extraction for you. The file includes two sheets for clarity (Please see the attached):
  • Simple Products
  • Variable Products

Please let us know if you’d like the data formatted in any particular way.

Thanks

The full list is greater than the list on Kodilo and some codes differ as they are now Lead Free codes. We need to start with a download from the back end of Kodilo please for us to qualify codes.

Can you please extract this for us

Sarah

Hi Sarah,

I hope you are doing well.

When we checked the product setup, we noticed the SKU fields for a few variations are empty, which is why they’re defaulting to the parent SKU (94090X).
Could you please confirm the correct SKUs for the following finishes?
  • TAYA Basin Mixer (94090X)
    • Brass: 94102
    • Copper: ——
    • Graphite: ——
  • AQUAZZONE Floor Mount Bath Filler Gooseneck (98825)
    • Matte Black: ——

To make things easier, we’ve set up a private page where you can check if any other SKUs are affected:
Product List Check

Appreciate your help on this—just send through the details through and we will update the products variation sku.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Andy and Team

We have an issue with the product code that is being used on the order.

Example -

TAYA Basin Mixer in Brass is ordered

In the example below the code shows as - 94090X

All codes with X are Parent Codes only

We use the Chrome code plus an X for all parent codes where we have colour finish variations

In the case below the customer bought Brass colour

Code for TAYA Basin Mixer Brass is 94102

The order we receive is showing the Parent Code and not the actual product code that indicates the colour way

Can you pleas correct this as a priority for Kodilo.

Thank you

Sarah


Sarah Fairweather
General Manager
M 0416 156 447
P 08 6217 0600
|
FREECALL
1800 800 919
| F 08 6217 0699
15 Mumford Place, Balcatta WA 6021
From: Suzi Martins <SMartins@aldertapware.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 6 August 2025 8:45 AM
To: Sarah Fairweather <SFairweather@aldertapware.com.au>
Cc: Aldertapware Sales <sales@aldertapware.com.au>
Subject: KODILO Product Codes & Colours
Sarah

How do we fix the code issues on the Kodilo website?

We have now received 3 requests for returns based on the codes on the Kodilo site

E.g Michael Lamaro - PO 6129 - stated he ordered Taya Brass Mixer and he received chrome

The order comes through with the chrome code and in brackets brass

The team are entering the code & pricing as per the order

The other issue is the same pricing across all the finishes.






Suzi Martins
Operations Manager
